snippet.title: 5-star Chuma Edoga commits to USC over Georgia, Tennessee
snippet.description:
5-star Chuma Edoga commits to USC over Georgia, Tennessee by Kevin Trahan on Apr 21 2014, 8:22p
Five-star lineman opts to go West over staying home in the South.

snippet.title: April 19, 2014 spring games TV schedule: A-Day, Texas and more
snippet.description:
April 19, 2014 spring games TV schedule: A-Day, Texas and more by Pete Volk on Apr 19 2014, 8:01a
Both A-Day games, that is. And USC, Washington, and Missouri are among the other schools to host their exhibition game Saturday.

snippet.title: Xs and Os: Why Steve Sarkisian's USC won't mean a Lane Kiffin rehash
snippet.description:
Xs and Os: Why Steve Sarkisian's USC won't mean a Lane Kiffin rehash by Ian Boyd on Apr 22 2014, 8:59a
The Trojans will be embracing fully modern schemes on both sides of the ball, rather than making minor tweaks to the system of the past. Not the expected strategy from USC's former OC.

snippet.title: 5-star DT Rasheem Green breaks down his recruitment
snippet.description:
5-star DT Rasheem Green breaks down his recruitment by Miles Joseph on Apr 21 2014, 8:51a
See what the five-star defensive tackle has to say about a couple of the schools recruiting him, when he might make a college decision and more.

snippet.title: Standout DB recruit DeChaun Holiday talks early interests, process
snippet.description:
Standout DB recruit DeChaun Holiday talks early interests, process by Miles Joseph on Apr 21 2014, 9:01a
See what standout CB/S DeChaun Holiday had to say about a couple of the schools recruiting him the hardest, when he might make a decision, and more.

snippet.title: Jashon Cornell planning visits: 5-star DE recruit to commit on August 28
snippet.description:
Jashon Cornell planning visits: 5-star DE recruit to commit on August 28 by Bud Elliott on Apr 14 2014, 5:38p
The Midwest might be down for the recruiting class of 2015, but there are still some superstar prospects in the region. Jashon Cornell, of St. Paul (Minn.) Cretin-Derham Hall, is one of those...

snippet.title: Standout WR Preston Williams remains committed to Tennessee, but still open to other schools
snippet.description:
Standout WR Preston Williams remains committed to Tennessee, but still open to other schools by Miles Joseph on Apr 8 2014, 8:16p
Preston Williams remains a Vols commit, but says he is still looking at other schools. See what he had to say about Tennessee, Georgia, Florida and Auburn.

snippet.title: Pete Carroll, Seahawks agree to contract extension, to no one's suprise
snippet.description:
Pete Carroll, Seahawks agree to contract extension, to no one's suprise by Louis Bien on Apr 4 2014, 11:13a
Pete Carroll helped craft the Seahawks into a Super Bowl winner using an uncommon approach to football. For his efforts, Seattle may make Carroll the richest head coach in the game.

snippet.title: Charlotte NFTC DL MVP Joshua Brown waiting for first offer
snippet.description:
Charlotte NFTC DL MVP Joshua Brown waiting for first offer by Wescott Eberts on Apr 2 2014, 4:11p
The local product was one of the top defensive linemen in attendance.

snippet.title: Mark Sanchez will sign with Eagles, according to report
snippet.description:
Mark Sanchez will sign with Eagles, according to report by Adam Stites on Mar 27 2014, 12:55p
The ex-Jets quarterback hopes to rebuild his career away from the New York spotlight.
